bug.author: tlkh
bug.description:
Thank you for submitting a TensorFlow documentation issue. Per our GitHub policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests, and build/installation issues on GitHub. The TensorFlow docs are open source! To get involved, read the documentation contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.14/api_docs/python/tf/train/experimental/enable_mixed_precision_graph_rewrite>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r1.14/api_docs/python/tf/train/experimental/enable_mixed_precision_graph_rewrite</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Should better explain the graph rewrite algorithm (black/white/grey listed ops) and where to see the list of ops. Overall language can be clearer and more precise. Minor issues with the formatting.
<denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
Links present are all correct. <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
Briefly explain what the value "dynamic" (the default value) for loss_scale does, and link to the symbol for that. <denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
Return values are defined properly. <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
Exceptions are not listed nor explained. <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
No usage example, I can provide a simple code snippet. Additionally, I want to provide a Colab notebook to demonstrate increase in speed without negative impact on accuracy (on CIFAR10 for example). <denchmark-h:h3>Request visuals, if applicable</denchmark-h>
Overview of mixed precision process/flow
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes, I have submitted a PR. PR is here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/29249>#29249</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Closing this issue since the associated PR has been merged. Thanks!

Are you satisfied with the resolution of your issue? <denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=Yes&entry.2137816233=29241>Yes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfaP12TRhd9xSxjXZjcZFNXPGk4kc1-qMdv3gc6bEP90vY1ew/viewform?entry.85265664=No&entry.2137816233=29241>No</denchmark-link>
